description: CommonDeploymentConfiguration contains common deployment configurations for multiple Gardener components

podAnnotations.description: PodAnnotations are additional annotations on the pods.

podLabels.description: PodLabels are additional labels on the pods.

replicaCount.description: ReplicaCount is the number of replicas. Default: 1.

resources.description: Resources are compute resources required by the container.

serviceAccountName.description: ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to create and mount into the pod.

vpa.description: VPA specifies whether to enable VPA for the deployment. Default: false.
